articles.title: Apple Stock: 30% Downside Risk, Explained - TheStreet
articles.description: Apple stock is poised to sink by more than 30%. At least this is what one Wall Street analyst has been saying. The Apple Maven analyzes the bearish case and the key driver of potential share price decline.

articles.title: New Mach-E Owners Are Drawing the Ire of Tesla Fanboys Over Positive Reviews - autoevolution
articles.description: In the echo chamber that is the internet at large, things go from passionate to murderous in a matter of seconds. Add the famously short-tempered Tesla community to the mix, and you get a bizarre but very telling sign of the times.
